1.png.description: The white milk jug is visible on the table, slightly off-center. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

2.png.description: The white milk jug is clearly visible and centered on the table. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

3.png.description: The white milk jug is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth details. There are no obstacles blocking the view.
